channel.title: Magic on PeekBehind
channel.description: Recent content in Magic on PeekBehind

item.title: Steven Brundage and the Art of Cube Deception
item.description: How Steven Brundage uses raw skill, false scrambles, and psychological mastery to transform the humble Rubik’s Cube into a canvas for modern magic.

item.title: Triad Coins: How Joshua Jay Engineered the Cleanest Coin Vanish in Magic
item.description: Discover how Joshua Jay’s Triad Coins uses precision-crafted shells to create a vanish so clean, even magicians are left speechless. A masterclass in deception and design.

item.title: Deconstructing the Dream: How Shin Lim Rewrote the Rules of Card Magic
item.description: Peek behind the curtain of Shin Lim’s award-winning Dream Act—an intricate fusion of sleight of hand, smoke, psychology, and musical mastery that redefined close-up magic.
